thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The Conservative Wheelman

author: Kyle Peterson
title: The Conservative Wheelman
text:
Culver City, Calif.
Pat Sajak was tweeting Hillary Clinton jokes again. Days before I was scheduled to interview him after a taping of “Wheel of Fortune,” the show he has hosted for 34 years, Mr. Sajak pecked out a message: “Just received an email from the Clinton campaign. Must be important; it’s marked ‘Top Secret.’ ”
The previous week Mr. Sajak had sent this to his 80,000 Twitter followers: “Exciting breakthrough near:... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
